paragraph2.title: Experience
paragraph2.description: I created WordPress websites for two years, which gave me deeper insight into the notions of performance, accessibility, security and SEO : this has enabled me to develop a skill-set of essential good practices to implement at the outset of website construction, garanteeing durability and natural search engine optimization.

paragraph3.title: Background
paragraph3.description: For over a decade now, I have also been working under the name SybR, as a family documentary photographer. Previously, I had a twelve-year career as an emergency department X-ray tecnichian (working night shifts !).

portfolio1.title: SybR Lab
portfolio1.description: I like clean, smooth websites, where typography and design have an important place. Typography is set on a modular scale based on the Golden ratio, a reference and inspiration derived from my photography career. Here I have developed a quite simple one-page construction that I made without any framework at first, with a Parcel bundle. I then migrated the website into Nuxt, with Greensock library powering animation, and i18n providing internationalization.

portfolio2.title: WSSA
portfolio2.description: I carried out Front-end work on this application that presents the competition results of the Word Slalom Skaters Association. Rankings are displayed with the Datatables Plugin in Ruby on Rails framework.

portfolio3.title: PhotographR
portfolio3.description: This is a project made in ten days during Le Wagon bootcamp : it is a customer relationship management application designed for photographers. It can be viewed on YouTube, presented by Oph√©lie, project coordinator.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description:
Are you an established Company, a Startup business, a Web Agency or a Developer in need of a Front-end developer ?
I am available for short and long-term assignments on a freelance basis, as well as being open to offers to join your team !
